item.title: Books I have read
item.description: I have a folder of notes which I use to record my thoughts on some book I read. Here are a collection of those notes for books I read in 2018 and 2019. Much spoilers, please skip if you intend to read. I don’t agree with everything I wrote back then, but here they are~ Who moved my cheese Simple simple story of not overthink, feel sorry for yourself, and let emotions cloud yourÂ judgment, decisions and actions.
